amendment.description: Amendment requires States to provide overseas voters 45 days to return their ballots from the date on which the ballot is mailed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order by a previous order of the House and offered in lieu of amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-466 to insert provisions into the bill which protect the ability of absent military and overseas voters to participate in special elections.
